summary: Six Flags is a big amusement park company based in North Carolina, USA. It was created in 2024 when two popular theme park companies, Cedar Fair and the old Six Flags, merged. Now, Six Flags runs 51 parks across North America, including fun places like amusement parks, water parks, and resorts. This makes it one of the largest entertainment companies of its kind in the world.
title: Six Flags
